data.message: To the people complaining about what he said in his freestyle. Unfollow his page quit coming to his comments and complaining about it. Just because I don't like what he said does not mean I won't listen to his music, the great thing about America is we can disagree on things, someone can tell me to fuck off or I can tell somebody else to fuck off and we move about our day. Think about it. How many people in your life have told you to fuck off? I can assure you that you talk too many of them still.

replies.message: You don't even realize how hypocritical your comment is. I'll let you go back and reread it and figure it out.
